price: “Proveli smo dan ili samo dio dana”, odgovorit će, “pitaj one koji su brojali.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖ فَسۡـَٔلِ ٱلۡعَآدِّينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū labith'nā yawman aw baʿḍa yawmin fasali al-ʿādīna
